metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel tells Shadowheart her suspicions are tiring. Shadowheart says they are necessary.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Your sour face is tiring, Shadowheart. By all means leave, if I am so distasteful.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I'd rather not turn my back on you, if it's all the same.
